text: Gorgeous clinic with the friendliest receptionist and doctor! Dr Taufiq was very knowledgable and patient with me as I explained my needs and concerns I had. He was very empathetic to my nervousness which helped to calm my nerves. Highly recommend this clinic for your men’s health needs!

Check out Dr Taufiq's newest clinic, so well located, and classily designed with the best views of Tanjong Pagar. Most importantly, he's incredibly patient and knowledgable in answering all my questions & doubts, really taking to the time to walk me through all the steps in the procedures and listening to all my concerns. Strongly recommend!

Dr. Taufik at TAF Clinic is a fantastic doctor! His professionalism and reliability are truly outstanding. He's not only incredibly knowledgeable and provides credible advice, but he also has such warm and awesome manners. It's clear he genuinely cares about his patients. The entire clinic has a welcoming and inviting atmosphere, and the staff are all incredibly professional and friendly – truly human-facing. I highly recommend Dr. Taufik and TAF Clinic!

Doctor Taufiq was very professional and I felt comfortable discussing my issues with him. With his skilled hands, the procedure was done very well and recovery was almost painless. I'd easily recommend him for any men's health procedure that you require! Thank you

Dr. Taufiq is exceptionally good at what he does. He demonstrates a high level of professionalism in every interaction and consistently shows genuine care and dedication to his patients. His calm demeanor and thoughtful approach create a reassuring environment, making it easy to trust his expertise. He takes the time to listen, explain things clearly, and ensure that all concerns are addressed thoroughly. It’s evident that he is not only highly skilled in his field, but also truly passionate about providing the best possible care.
